caption.p: Tetracycline hydrochloride-, amoxicillin-, and gentamicin-sulfate-loaded hydrogels release; ( a) release kinetic at pH = 7.3 and 21 °C; ( b) fraction of released antibiotic at equilibrium for different pH values at 21 °C; ( c) fraction of released antibiotic at equilibrium variation with swelling fluid temperature at pH = 7.3.
